entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [NativeAOT Library] Exceptions thrown from `[UnmanagedFunctionPointer]` delegate can't be caught in `[UnmanagedCallersOnly]` method #97952
  • Invalid codegen for custom IL with ldtoken #97949
  • Instrument<T>.RecordMeasurement does not record if given empty TagList on .NET Framework #97948
  • Hashset.TrimExcess(int capacity) corrupts hashset data structure #97947
  • Marking a BlockingCollection with CompleteAdding() later causes System.OperationCanceledException to be thrown #97946
  • 'System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider.CreateValidIdentifier(string)` fails on potential identifiers that begin with a number (C#) #97945
  • NegotiateStream with ProtectionLevel.Sign failed in .NET 8 #97942
  • DefaultMeterFactory does not pass MeterOptions future properties to Meter constructor #97941
  • [API Proposal]: Consider support for `IEquatable<Uri>` on `System.Uri` #97940
  • Uri.TryCreate (and ctor) behave weird when using the IPv6 format #97939
  • Remove System.Text.Json & System.Diagnostic.DiagnositicSource as a dependency for newer TFM when it is provided by Framework #97938
  • [Feature Request]: Only include packages when not provided by the framework #97937
  • Test failure System.Net.Security.Tests.SslStreamCertificateContextOcspLinuxTests.RefreshOcspResponse_BeforeExpiration #97936

Closed

  • Performance regression with System.Numerics.Vector when retargeting from .NET 7 to .NET 8 #94920

PullRequests

Created

  • [WIP] Place vtable slots deemed final by analysis into sealed vtable #97951
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix NRE with UnicodeEncoding when target is an empty span #97950
    area-System.Text.Encoding, community-contribution
  • Fix interpreter #97935
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: Implement IF_SVE_FD_3A, IF_SVE_FD_3B, IF_SVE_FD_3C #97934
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: Implement IF_SVE_F{A,B,C}_3{A,B} #97933
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve

Merged

  • Don't use VN when it's already stale #97943
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Try to fold basic arithmetic operations as part of import #97901
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [NativeAOT/ARM] Save R9 (REG_SAVED_LOCALLOC_SP) in PInvoke frames #97919
    arch-arm32, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • IL test entry points should be in types so test discovery can occur. #97904
    test-bug, area-TypeSystem-coreclr, 9.0.0

Updated

  • Make some Span methods NonVersionable #94258
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: ARM64 SVE format encodings, `SVE_IF_4A` to `SVE_JK_4B` #97739
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • Add support for ISpanFormattable in StringBuilder.Append(Object) #92197
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Fast field access #97784
    area-System.Reflection
  • Ported interleaving support to System.IO.Packaging #97898
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Implement HttpWebRequest AllowWriteStreamBuffering property #95001
    area-System.Net
  • Fix building on ARMhf userland on top of AARCH64 kernel #97929
    arch-arm32, os-linux, area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix regex lazy loop handling of backtracking state at max iteration limit #97927
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 8.0.x
  • Issue 96277: Order by memory footprint #97277
    area-System.Linq, community-contribution
  • [mono][jit] SIMD cleanups #97918
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Optimize BigInteger.Parse(powerOfTen) #97589
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Standardize on using code location for interior asm code references #97853
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Update TensorPrimitives to vectorize for size(T) is 1 or 2 #97835
    area-System.Numerics
